text: Summer Rental is a 1985 American comedy movie directed by Carl Reiner and starring John Candy, Joey Lawrence, Rip Torn, Karen Austin, Kerri Green, John Larroquette. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:1985 adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Carl Reiner Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Summer Rental
